original_text: Then King David went into the Lord's tent. He sat down and he prayed to the Lord. He said, ‘ Lord, my God, I am not a special person and my family is not special. You have helped me very much and I do not deserve it.
korean_text: 다윗 왕이 여호와 앞에 들어가 앉아서 이르되 여호와 하나님이여 나는 누구이오며 내 집은 무엇이기에 나에게 이에 이르게 하셨나이까

sentences.original_text: Then King David went into the Lord's tent.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 다윗 왕은 주의 장막으로 들어갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: and he prayed to the Lord.
I am not a special person
and my family is not special.
You have helped me very much
and I do not deserve it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 저는 그것을 받을 자격이 없습니다.
